marklogic.body:
Crock Pot Recipes: Cola Chicken
1 family size package chicken wings 2 cup catsup 2 - 12oz. can cola (, Coke, etc.) 2- packages McCormicks Buffalo wings seasoning
Put chicken in a non-stick pan. Mix together catsup and cola, seasoningâ€¦.pour over chicken. Bring to a boil. Reduce Heatâ€¦cover with lid..and cook 45 minutes. (turning chicken a few times, while cooking...to prevent from sticking to pan) Cook until the sauce becomes thick and adheres to the chicken.
It turns into the most incredible BBQ sauce. Yummmm!
I used the spices from a MILD (I don't care for "HOT") Buffalo Wings packet...(the kind you get to bake in the oven).....I thought it was really good.....(but you/I can't find a 'bad' way to fix chicken).
This recipe is doubledâ€¦..for my husband and myselfâ€¦I use Â½ the ingredients.
You can doubleâ€¦the doubleâ€¦.and more as you like.
BBQ Ribs
Use the same method (Cola Chicken)â€¦.leave out McCormicks seasoning.
Ribs & Chicken wings both goodâ€¦..andâ€¦â€¦â€˜s I m p l eâ€™â€¦..to fixâ€¦!!
Mushroom Chicken
4 chicken breast 1 can cream of mushroom soup water
Mix a can of cream of mushroom soup with can of water. Place chicken in crock pot. Pour soup over chicken and cook on medium ....4-5 hours....or until desired doneness.
Find more quick â€“ simple â€“ E-Z â€“ few ingredientâ€¦.recipesâ€¦at E-Z Cookinâ€™ group:
http://groups.yahoo.com/group/e-zcookin/
Lots of interesting â€˜stuffâ€™ in files & linksâ€¦come join & check it out.
Pat in Indianaâ€¦.
